basics.name: Kana'i Gooding
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Mathematics & Computer Science at the University of Hawaii.  I hope to enter the informatics field when I graduate in Spring 2023.  I have experience in project management and strategic planning from my time in various leadership positions.  I enjoy giving back to the community through education and environmental conservation.

highlights: Implemented & executed a communications strategy (first 8 months of operations).  Set expectations for team members and direction of projects.  Created a social media team to operate independently of director-level management.

work.company: ACM: Programing and Algorithms Special Interest Group - PANDA
highlights: Responsible for establishing the club's goals and strategies and presiding over the entire officer board. Managed time, budget, and scope of projects.  Streamlined internal communication leading to fewer meetings.

work.company: ACM: Programing and Algorithms Special Interest Group - PANDA
highlights: Managed internal projects, set expectations for team members, maintained deadlines.  Worked with industry professionals.

work.company: University of Hawaii at Manoa: College of Natural Sciences
highlights: ICS 211: Introduction to Computer Science II.  Attended lab times, facilitated activities, and ran additional sessions outside of class times.
Implemented design, development, deployment, and maintenance of the website.  Oversaw all aspects of the website.
Generated sales, assisted store manager, managed daily accounting, and directed junior staff.

volunteer.organization: ACM: Programing and Algorithms Special Interest Group - PANDA
highlights: Practiced algorithm mock interviews, attended workforce events, and meetings as a non-leadership member.

volunteer.organization: ACM: Cyber Security Special Interest Group - GREY HATS
highlights: Attended student-lead lectures of topics related to cyber defense
